item.description:
Weekend at the World Fellowship Center in NH, White Mountains area.

http://www.worldfello...

Summer Season opens with 6 pm Dinner, Th., June 24, Following welcome/Intro at 7:30 pm.

Friday, June 25, 7 pm Fun Night (bring your talent and perform!) , following 7:30 pm Storyteller , Andy Davis, (Director of the center) tells a set of favorite tales. (very captivating!)

Sat., June 26, 7:30 pm The Peregrine Players - Concert by inspiring, fun "Early Music Week" Faculty - "Italia Mia" (The dream of unified Italy was kept alive during the Renaissance by artists, writers, and musicians. Explore the culture's music, note the influence radiated to the rest of Europe that generated models for all musical genres over several centuries....(from the program calendar of WFC)

The camp is a Gem !!! Food is great, people friendly! You'll feel at home, finding a new extended Family!!
There is a Farm, and could be an opportunity to get dirty for a couple of hours if you'd like. Real goats and chicken!! Please check the site!! Below, for your convenience quick references on details. In July we could get a discount if we are 10 or more!! See you soon! Please call with questions: 781-718-6203, Maia
